Description.Text: Rooms with large balcony, satellite TV, fridge ( for rent ), direct dial telephone, private safe, radio and music. Hotel facilities: children's pool, tennis court, table Ttnnis, basketball, mini soccer, water sports nearby.
Hotel is locatedon the beach of Scarleta, 15km from Rethymno, 62km from Heraklio, 72km from Chania.
